sentences.en: "Given the level of competition in law, I definitely think that my postgraduate degree helped to distinguish me from the crowd, " he says.
sentences.cn: 他说，“考虑到在法律行业的竞争水平，我确实认为我的研究生学位让我从众人中脱颖而出”。

sentences.en: After college, Mary hopes to do postgraduate work in law school.
sentences.cn: 大学毕业后, 玛丽想在法学院从事研究工作.

sentences.en: Attracted by the greatness of English language, Gu even changed her major from accounting to English in her postgraduate study.
sentences.cn: 顾秋蓓被英语这门语言的魅力所吸引，她甚至将自己的研究生专业从会计转到了英语专业。

sentences.en: But I have seen a wonderful basketball game between my class and postgraduate class.
sentences.cn: 但是我看到了一个精彩的篮球比赛我们班和研究生之间类。

sentences.en: But I have seen a wonderful basketball game between my class and postgraduate class.
sentences.cn: 但我已经看到了我们班和研究生班之间的一场精彩的篮球比赛。

sentences.en: Dr Hoffman did his postgraduate work at Leicester University.
sentences.cn: 霍夫曼博士是在莱斯特大学读的研究生。

sentences.en: Have you taken any relevant postgraduate qualifications?
sentences.cn: 你有没有相关的研究生证书？

sentences.en: He has made up his mind to pursue postgraduate study.
sentences.cn: 他已决心攻读硕士研究生.

sentences.en: Hey , big news! John is going to have the postgraduate exam.
sentences.cn: 嘿! 大新闻! 约翰要考研了!

sentences.en: Imbeger and financially assisted by a University of Western Australia postgraduate Studentship.
sentences.cn: 该项研究工作得到了该大学研究生助学金审议会的资助.

sentences.en: It is two years since I became a postgraduate student.
sentences.cn: 我成为研究生已有两年了.

sentences.en: It will achieve the ultimate goal of postgraduate employment education.
sentences.cn: 最终实现研究生就业教育目标.

sentences.en: postgraduate degrees
sentences.cn: 研究生学位

sentences.en: She seems a postgraduate.
sentences.cn: 他似乎是个研究生.

sentences.en: Some senior students wrote in asking for information concerning postgraduate studies.
sentences.cn: 一些四年级学生写信询问有关研究生课程的信息.

sentences.en: The highest scholarship went to a postgraduate majoring in physics.
sentences.cn: 最高额的奖学金颁给了一位物理研究生.

sentences.en: The lack of academic integrity among Chinese postgraduate students is nowadays prevalent.
sentences.cn: 摘要研究生学术诚信的缺乏危害程度非常大.

sentences.en: The self-catering flats are usually reserved for postgraduate students.
sentences.cn: 可以自己做饭的公寓一般留给研究生住。

sentences.en: The University has a well-established tradition of welcoming postgraduate students from overseas.
sentences.cn: 这所大学有着欢迎海外研究生就读的悠久传统。

sentences.en: The university has two halls of residence for its postgraduate students.
sentences.cn: 这所大学有两座研究生宿舍.

sentences.en: They are more important to postgraduate research in engineering and science.
sentences.cn: 他们对理工科研究生级的研究尤其重要.

phrases.tran_cn: 研究生文凭；研究生文凭课程

trans.tran_cn: 大学毕业后的，研究院的
trans.tran_en: relating to studies done at a university after completing a first degree
someone who is studying at a university to get a  master’s degree  or a  phd
